Package com.passwordmanager

Class PasswordManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.passwordmanager.PasswordManager
  • public class PasswordManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages password storage and retrieval operations for the password manager application. This class handles file I/O operations, ensuring data persistence and providing methods to save, load, and manage password entries.
    Since:
    2025-06-03
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jose Mondragon

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  PasswordManager.PasswordManagerException
      Custom exception class for PasswordManager operations.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PasswordManager

        public PasswordManager()
                throws PasswordManager.PasswordManagerException
        Constructs a new PasswordManager with the default filename. Creates the storage directory if it doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        PasswordManager.PasswordManagerException - if initialization fails

      • PasswordManager

        public PasswordManager​(java.lang.String filename)
                throws PasswordManager.PasswordManagerException
        Constructs a new PasswordManager with a specified filename. Creates the storage directory if it doesn't exist.
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file to store passwords
        Throws:
        PasswordManager.PasswordManagerException - if initialization fails

    • Method Detail

      • savePassword

        public void savePassword​(PasswordEntry entry)
                  throws PasswordManager.PasswordManagerException
        Saves a password entry to the file and adds it to the in-memory collection.
        Parameters:
        entry - the password entry to save
        Throws:
        PasswordManager.PasswordManagerException - if saving fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if entry is null

      • getAllPasswords

        public java.util.List<PasswordEntry> getAllPasswords()
        Retrieves all password entries currently managed.
        Returns:
        a copy of the list of password entries

      • findPasswordByName

        public PasswordEntry findPasswordByName​(java.lang.String name)
        Searches for a password entry by name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to search for
        Returns:
        the password entry if found, null otherwise

      • getPasswordCount

        public int getPasswordCount()
        Returns the number of password entries currently managed.
        Returns:
        the count of password entries

      • containsPasswordWithName

        public boolean containsPasswordWithName​(java.lang.String name)
        Checks if a password with the given name exists.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to check
        Returns:
        true if a password with this name exists, false otherwise

      • exportPasswords

        public void exportPasswords​(java.nio.file.Path exportPath)
                     throws PasswordManager.PasswordManagerException
        Exports all passwords to a specified file in a formatted manner.
        Parameters:
        exportPath - the path where to export passwords
        Throws:
        PasswordManager.PasswordManagerException - if export fails

      • getFilePath

        public java.nio.file.Path getFilePath()
        Returns the file path where passwords are stored.
        Returns:
        the file path

      • clearPasswords

        public void clearPasswords​(boolean deleteFile)
                    throws PasswordManager.PasswordManagerException
        Clears all passwords from memory and optionally from the file.
        Parameters:
        deleteFile - if true, also deletes the password file
        Throws:
        PasswordManager.PasswordManagerException - if file deletion fails

      • reloadFromFile

        public void reloadFromFile()
                    throws PasswordManager.PasswordManagerException
        Reloads passwords from the file, discarding any unsaved changes.
        Throws:
        PasswordManager.PasswordManagerException - if reloading fails

      • appendPasswordToFile

        private void appendPasswordToFile​(PasswordEntry entry)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Appends a password entry to the file.
        Parameters:
        entry - the password entry to append
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if writing fails

      • loadPasswordsFromFile

        private void loadPasswordsFromFile()
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Loads passwords from the file into memory. This method parses the file format and reconstructs PasswordEntry objects.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if reading fails

      • parsePasswordEntryLine

        private PasswordEntry parsePasswordEntryLine​(java.lang.String line)
        Parses a single line from the password file to create a PasswordEntry.
        Parameters:
        line - the line to parse
        Returns:
        the parsed PasswordEntry, or null if parsing fails

      • writeFileHeader

        private void writeFileHeader​(java.io.BufferedWriter writer,
                             java.lang.String title)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a formatted header to the file.
        Parameters:
        writer - the BufferedWriter to write to
        title - the title for the header
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if writing fails

      • getPasswordStrengthDescription

        private java.lang.String getPasswordStrengthDescription​(PasswordEntry entry)
        Gets a human-readable description of password strength.
        Parameters:
        entry - the password entry to evaluate
        Returns:
        strength description
